archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.2.7a: a) applying security architecture principles, including 'secure by design', 'defence in depth', 'secure by default', 'default deny', 'fail secure', 'distrust input from external applications', 'secure in deployment' and 'usability and manageability'
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
